name: Comet Breaker (our first Game ever )
description:
Hey ;) 

So  , a friend and I Made our first game in unity using assets from an old bundle i bought at humbleBundle a few months ago.

This is our attempt at making a top down space shooter (kinda like asteroid) with different enemies .

We will take advices with great pleasure and we thank you very much if you want to test out our first game.

Controls are : Space to dash, directional keys (or WASD) to move ,left click or ctrl to use Fire1 , and rightClick to use missiles
